title: Lf Duo, G2+
body: Right now I am g2, was g1 yesterday #RipPlatDream but i'm making a serious push to not only improve, but get myself to plat seeing as I was so close not so long ago. (90 lp G1...too close) As we all know, solo q can end up getting a little frustrating, and sometimes put people on tilt, I am trying to avoid this, so having someone to duo with would be beneficial. I main jungle heavily, i'm pretty chill with the other roles since I can play them though. Anyone interested throw me a Friend request.

replies.body: Main Support/Mid Gold 4 now yeah if you want to duo
